title: Introducing: Laurasia
body:
Australia once again proving why it’s leagues ahead of the game when it comes to exciting, electronic pop music.

Having only been around for a matter of months, and their debut single only uploaded a few days ago, it’s clearly very very early days, for **Laurasia**, but if _Rainmaker_ is anything to go by, then they’re definitely one to keep an eye out for. Mixing off-kilter pop with more radio ready influences, the likes of Grouplove and CHVRCHES spring to mind, it’s vibrant, colourful and just downright enjoyable. Check out Rainmaker below, thanks to [Hillydilly](http://www.hillydilly.com/2014/09/laurasia-rainmaker/) for the heads up.
